description.narrative: For GGF funds will support Sistemas Naturales y Desarrollo, A.C.'s (SINADES) Environmental Education Program, which will be directed toward rural communities in El Pescadero, Baja California Sur, and aims to change the communities' relationship with natural resources and promote forms of sustainable development. SINADES will specifically run a children's education program aimed at kindergarten, primary, and secondary schools; a solid waste management program, which will promote responsible consumption and methods of waste disposal (including composting and recycling); a community outreach program that will sensitize community members on sustainable living techniques such as renewable energy, water catchment systems, recycling techniques; and a community food sovereignty and security program that entails building greenhouses for specific families in the region and launching a children's gardening program.
